column4: is it possible to install another x interface like xfce or even kde without removing gnome.  id like to just be able to switch to xfce with a command but if i dont ubuntu still works just loke normal
you can have a dozen 'desktops' installed at the same time...
your menus may get a bit cluttered.. but GDm should have a menu to select what desktop to load to.
i got Gnome, KDE, and Lxde all on this box.
